actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to the taxation of employees' annuities in cases where employee contributions are recoverable in 1 year.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a tax exclusion for annuities under endowment or life insurance contracts where the employee contributions are recoverable during the first year of annuity payments.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to the taxation of employees' annuities in cases where employee contributions are recoverable in 1 year.
